stories.original_headline: Scientists find a massive hidden CO2 sponge beneath the ocean floor
stories.original_summary: Researchers found that eroded lava rubble beneath the South Atlantic can trap enormous amounts of CO2 for tens of millions of years. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Vast Dark Air Trap Beneath the Southern Seas!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Alchemists' Guild has unearthed a secret under the great southern ocean. Beneath ancient volcanic rock, they found porous stone capable of absorbing vast amounts of noxious fumes. This grand discovery could help cleanse the kingdom's air for ages to come.

stories.fantasy_headline: Two New Grand Sagas Unveiled from the Sunken Crypts!
stories.fantasy_story: The Crystal Clan and the River Guild have revealed magnificent news for all adventurers. Instead of just one, two grand new sagas about the famous Explorer Lady Lara will soon be presented. Tales of ancient ruins and forgotten magic are expected in the coming years.

stories.fantasy_headline: Wise Gifts for the Winter Solstice, Under Fifty Gold Coins!
stories.fantasy_story: As the Winter Solstice Festival approaches, many worry about squandering their precious gold coins. Fear not, for the Royal Merchants' Guild has assembled a list of splendid tokens. These delightful keepsakes cost less than fifty gold coins, helping you celebrate wisely this year.
